item.description:
Start off your weekend in style at NetSAP Boston's June Cocktail & Conversation.
Our official sponsor 'V-Fit' secures another great location at Mija Cantina and Tequila Bar in Faneuil Hall for Thursday June 21. Throw on your classiest duds and come join us for an evening of fun.
Network with new people, reconnect with old friends and get social at this splendid outdoor location.
Members: FREE
Non-members: $10
To know more about NetSAP Boston visit our website,
www.netsapboston.org
item.name: NetSAP's June Cocktail Party!
